articles.title: Foreign Ministry Spokesman on Its Delegation's Visit to China
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Spokesman on Its Delegation's Visit to China
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the foreign ministry of the DPRK Saturday gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA as regards its delegation's visit to China.
					 The delegation headed by First Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Kye Gwan visited China from Oct. 12 to 16 at the invitation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of China and had an exhaustive and candid discussion on the DPRK-China relations, the resumption of the six-party talks and the regional situation, etc.
					
					 The DPRK is ready for the resumption of the above-said talks but decided not to go hasty but to make ceaseless patient efforts now that the U.S. and some other participating countries are not ready for them.
					
					 The DPRK remains unchanged in its will to implement the September 19 joint statement adopted at the six-party talks for denuclearizing the whole Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Wang Zhaoguo Meets Delegation of DPRK Youth League
articles.content:
Wang Zhaoguo Meets Delegation of DPRK Youth League
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Wang Zhaoguo, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and vice-chairman of the Standing Committee of the Chinese National People's Congress, met and had a talk with the delegation of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League headed by First Secretary of its Central Committee Ri Yong Chol at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing on Oct. 15.
					 Recalling with deep emotion that he was received by President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary  Kim Jong Il during his visit to the DPRK, Wang Zhaoguo said:
					
					 The Sino-DPRK friendship provided by the leaders of the elder generation of the two countries is a treasure common to their peoples.
					
					 Kim Jong Il visited China twice this year, reaching a unanimity of views on important issues together with General Secretary Hu Jintao.
					
					 Wang Zhaoguo extended warm congratulations to Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea at the recent Conference of the WPK.
					
					 He referred to many successes made by the Korean people in protecting the sovereignty and dignity of the country and building socialism under the leadership of the WPK founded by the President.
					
					 He expressed belief that the youth organizations and young people of the two countries would make positive contributions to boosting the Sino-DPRK friendship through brisk exchanges and visits.

articles.title: WPK Delegation Leaves for China
articles.content:
WPK Delegation Leaves for China
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- A friendly delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Mun Kyong Dok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK and chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, left here by air on Saturday to visit China.

articles.title: Pyongyang Chukjon Secondary School Named after Kim Ju Hyok
articles.content:
Pyongyang Chukjon Secondary School Named after Kim Ju Hyok
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang Chukjon Secondary School was named after Kim Ju Hyok, a hero of the Republic, and his bust was erected at the school.
					 After graduating from a secondary school, Kim Ju Hyok joined the Korean People's Army and set an example in the military-political training.
					
					 He laid down his life while bravely fighting a battle with enemy's warships that intruded into the waters of the DPRK side in November last year.
					
					 A meeting was held on Oct. 15 to name the school Kim Ju Hyok Secondary School.
					
					 It was attended by officials concerned, his bereaved family, service persons of the KPA, teachers, students and their parents.
					
					 At the end of the meeting the participants looked round the hero's bust.

articles.title: Foreigners Here
articles.content:
Foreigners Here 
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Delegations and delegates of China, Germany, Russia, Singapore, Austria and Taipei of China arrived here by air on Saturday to participate in the 6th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair.
					 Earlier, delegations of Malaysia and Italy arrived.

articles.title: War Confab of Military Bosses of US and South Korea Assailed
articles.content:
War Confab of Military Bosses of US and S. Korea Assailed 
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The military bosses of the United States and south Korea were recently reported to have held a war confab over the issue of stifling the DPRK by force of arms, raising a hue and cry over "the nuclear issue of the north", "threat from the north" and the like at the 42nd U.S.-south Korea annual security consultative meeting and issued what they called "joint statement." 
					 Minju Joson Saturday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The frequent military huddles held by the U.S. and south Korean warlike forces against the DPRK, becoming more vociferous in crying out for "tightening the military alliance" than ever before are, in a nutshell, dangerous actions to ignite a new war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost and an unpardonable military challenge to the DPRK. 
					
					 It is the invariable strategic intention of the U.S. to put south Korea under its tighter military control and ignite another Korean war by using it as a springboard and thus realize its wild ambition for military domination over the DPRK. 
					
					 The commentary cites facts to prove that for this purpose the U.S. is putting spurs to rounding off the preparations for the second Korean War.
					
					 The evermore reckless moves of the U.S. warlike forces to escalate the military confrontation once again more patently prove who is the arch criminal threatening the peace and security of Korea, disturbing dialogue and negotiations and making the hostile relations persist, the commentary notes, and goes on: 
					
					 The prevailing situation goes to prove that the DPRK was entirely just when it bolstered up the military capability for self-defence to cope with the U.S. increasing military threat. 
					
					 The growing military threat of the U.S. warmongers will only compel the DPRK to bolster up its war deterrence in every way, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: US and S. Korean  PSI Exercises Slammed
articles.content:
US and S. Korean  PSI Exercises Slammed 
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers staged frantic PSI exercises with outside forces in waters off Pusan for two days from Oct. 13.
					 PSI is a dangerous tool fabricated and spearheaded by the U.S. prompted by its criminal intention to forcibly intercept, check up and search ships, planes, etc. of those countries which it considers as a thorn in the flesh under the pretext of curbing the proliferation of WMD including nuclear weapons and missiles.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 PSI exercises staged by the puppet group under the pretext of the conspiratorial case of warship sinking revealed the criminal scenario of the confrontation-minded maniacs to vitiate the hard-won atmosphere of dialogues and peace between the north and the south and push the inter-Korean relations to the brink of war. They were, therefore, an undisguised military provocation and declaration of a war against the DPRK. 
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the south Korean authorities spearheaded PSI exercises for the first time in history and drew even the "Self Defense Forces" of Japan into them.
					
					 The naval blockade exercises aimed at forcible check up and search of ships of specified countries are war exercises targeting the port blockade together with forcible seizure, check up and search of the DPRK-flagged ships.
					
					 What is needed for the north and the south is atmosphere of dialogue for spurring the improvement of relations, not saber-rattling.
					
					 The illegal and brigandish hostile acts such as PSI exercises will only spark off military conflict and worsen inter-Korean relations as they violate and infringe upon the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK. 
					
					 The persistent catastrophe in the inter-Korean relations is not beneficial to the south Korean authorities, either.
					
					 History and the nation will never pardon the south Korean authorities if they keep running reckless to escalate inter-Korean confrontation and launch a war against the north, quite contrary to the trend of the times and the aspiration of compatriots for the reconciliation and unity of the nation, the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and peace and reunification.

articles.title: Japan's Scheme for Nuclear Armament Blasted
articles.content:
Japan's Scheme for Nuclear Armament Blasted
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- It has been reported that in 1964 the Japan government worked out in secret a report on its nuclear policy stressing that "it is necessary to increase the potentiality for possessing nuclear weapons any time."
					 Meanwhile, a recently procured confidential document of the German Foreign Ministry disclosed that in February 1969 the Japan Foreign Ministry asked for West Germany's cooperation in producing materials for nukes, contending that Japan's technology is enough to do so, during the top-secret negotiations with this country which were participated in by six persons of the ministry including the head of its international data department. 
					
					 Commenting on the facts, a news analyst of Rodong Sinmun Saturday says they are historical evidence clearly showing that the Japanese reactionaries have long pursued nuclear armament while seeking to realize their wild design for reinvasion. 
					
					 The Japanese authorities, who have so far asserted their "honesty" in the nuclear issue, are getting very nervous when the scientific evidence was brought to light, the analyst notes, and goes on to say:
					
					 The recently disclosed top-secret document on the nuclear issue lays bare the true colors of the wicked Japanese reactionaries who are playing a double game with their nuclear design aimed at military overseas expansion.
					
					 Japan has styled itself as a "pacific state" and a "non-nuclear state", wearing the veil of the "three non-nuclear principles".
					
					 As a war criminal state, Japan was prohibited by law after the war from possessing any combat forces and using armed forces against other countries. But the Japanese militarists have persistently pushed for access to nuclear weapons out of revenge and awful regret that the defeat of the Japanese imperialists in the past was due to their failure to possess nukes. The "three non-nuclear principles" advocated by Japan are nothing but a camouflage to cover up its sinister nuclear design. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries apparently seek to realize their old dream of "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere" with having access to nukes, but such scheme will lead it to self-destruction.

articles.title: Patriotic Struggle for Reunification Called for
articles.content:
Patriotic Struggle for Reunification Called for
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The October resistance for democracy in south Korea was an eruption of the pent-up grudge and resentment of the south Korean people who had their elementary political freedom and democratic rights wantonly violated under the rule of foreign forces and the "Yusin" dictatorship.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It says:
					
					 The resistance clearly proved that no outrageous dictator can ever arrest the just patriotic struggle of the people and that the traitors to the nation are bound to meet miserable end.
					
					 The south Korean people's just demand for independence, democracy and reunification does not come true by itself but can be realized only through vigorous struggle. This is the truth of the history the patriotic fighters of the October resistance gained at the cost of blood.
					
					 It is a burning shame on the nation that it has suffered from the pain of division and the resultant misfortune with its sovereignty and dignity encroached upon by foreign forces for more than 60 years even though it had lived in harmony as a homogeneous nation on one territory for 5,000 years.
					
					 Whoever truly loves the country should never turn away from the pain of division suffered by the nation but devote oneself to the practical struggle for reunification, not just paying lip-service to patriotism.
					
					 For all the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad, genuine patriotism at present lies in absolutely supporting and defending the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and thoroughly implementing them. 
					
					 The south Korean people from all circles are becoming increasingly vocal in actively supporting the inter-Korean declarations and demanding the authorities' withdrawal of the anti-reunification and confrontational policy, defying the evermore vicious crackdown upon the pro-reunification democratic forces by the conservative group.
					
					 This goes to prove that no fascist suppression can interrupt or check the just struggle of the south Korean people.

articles.title: Tradition of Single-Minded Unity Carried Forward
articles.content:
Tradition of Single-Minded Unity Carried Forward
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are commemorating the 84th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU) with national pride of having General Secretary  Kim Jong Il reelected as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Whenever greeting the anniversary, they recollect the feats of the first generation of the revolution that started the history of unity in Huadian under the banner of the DIU.
					
					 At that time Kim Hyok, Cha Kwang Su, Choe Chang Gol and other young communists of the new generation respected President Kim Il Sung as the sun of the nation, united in mind around him, and defended the leader of the revolution at the cost of their lives.
					
					 The unity achieved by them was a guarantee of the victorious anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and a solid basis of the WPK's single-minded unity.
					
					 Carrying forward the spirit of the unity, the second generation of the revolution defeated the U.S. imperialists in the Fatherland Liberation War with concerted efforts and wrought miracles in the postwar rehabilitation and reconstruction and in socialist construction under the leadership of the President. 
					
					 Ideas and feats of leaders were obliterated and parties dismembered in some countries in the latter half of the 1980s, but the revolutionary cause of Juche could be advanced successfully in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea thanks to the unity.
					
					 The tradition of the unity, provided and defended by the old generations of the revolution, has been steadfastly carried forward by the third and fourth generations.
					
					 In the period of "Arduous March", the forced march when the country and the revolution were undergoing harsh ordeals, they displayed unparalleled heroism and devotion in defending the socialist society and making a breakthrough in the building of a thriving nation, rallied around leader Kim Jong Il as his comrades in the Songun revolution.
					
					 Basing itself on the tradition of the single-minded unity, which has continued through generations, the Korean revolution will always emerge victorious.

articles.title: US-S. Korea Large-scale Air Exercise Blasted
articles.content:
US-S. Korea Large-scale Air Exercise Blasted 
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers kicked off a large-scale air exercise for aggression in the air over the western area of the Korean Peninsula on Oct. 15.
					 Involved in the saber-rattling were F-15K, KF-16, F-4E, KC-135, C-130, CN-235 and other huge air force.
					
					 The war-like forces are contemplating staging an air battle drill and an exercise for tactical bombing of targets with large formations of aircraft involved during the period of the maneuver.
					
					 U.S.-based planes, in particular, are expected to participate in the war exercise.
					
					 This dangerous air exercise for a war of aggression against the DPRK kicked off by the U.S. imperialists and the Lee Myung Bak bellicose forces, timed to coincide with the extremely provocative maritime interception and search exercises related to the PSI in the waters off Pusan is driving the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war.

articles.title: War Confab between US and S. Korea Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
War Confab between US and S. Korea Protested in S. Korea
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- 14 civic and social organizations of south Korea staged the 133rd action for independent reunification and peace in Seoul on Oct. 12 to denounce the U.S. imperialists and the puppet forces for their criminal war confab gravely threatening peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					 They referred to the fact that the south Korea-U.S. annual security consultative meeting held in Washington on Oct. 8 dealt with only the issue of escalating the military threat and sanctions against the DPRK but did not take up the issue of peace on the Korean Peninsula at all.
					
					 The organizations accused the meeting of agreeing on the issues of turning the alliance for aggression into a permanent one, increasing south Korea's dependence on the U.S. and intensifying the exercises for a war of aggression against the DPRK and the Lee Myung Bak regime of signing the documents dealing with these issues.
					
					 Bitterly condemning the agreements aimed at escalating confrontation with the DPRK, they urged the south Korean authorities and the U.S. to roll back their policy for confrontation with the DPRK and come out as early as possible for dialogue and negotiations for building a peace-keeping regime on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Rev. Han Asserts Justice of His Activities for Reunification
articles.content:
Rev. Han Asserts Justice of His Activities for Reunification
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Rev. Han Sang Ryol, pro-reunification champion of south Korea, asserted at the second trial held at the puppet Seoul Central District Court on Oct. 11 that he visited the north for the sole purpose of preserving and implementing the June 15 joint declaration.
					 He recalled that while staying in the north, he was accorded cordial hospitality as an envoy for the national reconciliation and the peaceful reunification of the country, his visit to different places gave him an opportunity to know well about the reality and he could feel the strong desire of the compatriots in the north for reunification.
					
					 I make it clear that what I did was guided by religious faith, he emphasized.

articles.title: Application of Tuition-Waiver Program to Korean Schools Demanded
articles.content:
Application of Tuition-Waiver Program to Korean Schools Demanded
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- An emergency meeting of the parents of the students of Korean schools was held at Korean Middle and Senior High School in Tokyo on Oct. 9 demanding an immediate application of the tuition-waver program to the Korean senior high schools.
					 The participants of the meeting watched a video showing the actions of Koreans and students in Japan and Japanese citizens for the settlement of the issue of the above-said program.
					
					 Kim Sun On, chairman of the Tokyo Union of Korean Educational Association in Japan, in a report called for widely informing a broad strata of Japanese citizens in various parts of Japan of the justice of the actions for the application of the above-said program to the Korean schools and making efforts to ensure by the concerted efforts of the parents of Korean students that the program is immediately applied to them.
					
					 Speeches were made by Fumihiro Himori, former member of the House of Representatives from the Social-Democratic Party of Japan, Seizaburo Eguchi, representative of the Tokyo Assemblymen's Liaison Society for the Promotion of Japan-Korea Friendship, Kiyoshi Nishizawa, vice-chairman of the Japan-Korea Society for Scientific and Educational Interchange, and Kazuo Hasegawa, representative of the Liaison Society for Protesting against Exclusion of Korean Schools from Tuition-free Program for Senior High Schools.
					
					 They slammed the Japanese government's behavior, charging that the exclusion of Korean schools from the program is an unreasonable discriminating act as it is linked with political issues which have nothing to do with the educational issue, 
					
					 They declared that Japanese would actively solidarize with the Koreans in Japan in the actions for the prompt application of the above-said program to the Korean schools.
					
					 The floor was also taken by parents of Korean students and teachers and students.
					
					 At the meeting a written request to the Japanese prime minister and the minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology was adopted and an appeal to the parents of Korean students read out.

articles.title: Implementation of  Joint Declarations Called for
articles.content:
Implementation of  Joint Declarations Called for
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Committee for Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration made public a resolution in Germany on Oct. 9 on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration.
					 The resolution pointed out that the June 15 joint declaration, a milestone for Korea's reunification, and the October 4 declaration, a programme for its implementation, ushered in a new era of national unity and cooperation.
					
					 Who and why brought the favorably developing inter-Korean relations to a collapse and pushed the situation to the brink of a war, the resolution queried. It lashed out at the present south Korean "government" for working hard to quell the nation's desire for reunification and escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen, depending on outside forces.
					
					 The resolution held that in order to realize the national cooperation it is necessary to thoroughly implement the above-mentioned declarations common to the nation.
					
					 The committee will reject the distrust and confrontation between compatriots and boost the solidarity with organizations for peace and human rights in Europe for ensuring the peace and reunification of the nation, it concluded.

articles.title: Congratulatory Visits Paid to DPRK Embassies
articles.content:
Congratulatory Visits Paid to DPRK Embassies
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Personages of Bangladesh and Nigeria paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK embassies in those countries on Oct. 4 and 10 on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They were Dilip Barua, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Bangladesh (Marxist-Leninist) who doubles as minister of Industries, Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers Party of Bangladesh, Mujahidul Islam Selim, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Bangladesh Communist Party, Shahim Mahmed, international secretary of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh 
						National Socialist Party, Ragib Ahsan Munna, secretary general of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, M. M. Alhassan, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, Igwanagu Nicholas, chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of  Kimjongilism, and Ahmed Blaza Lawan, chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics.
					
					They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the full-length paintings of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il before paying tribute to them.

articles.title: Birthday of WPK Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
Birthday of WPK Marked in Different Countries
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Russia, Norway and Austria on Oct. 7 and 8 to congratulate Gweneral Secretary Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 65th birthday.
					 Displayed in the venues of the meetings were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and photos showing the immortal exploits they performed in leading the party building and pictures introducing the successes made by the Korean people in building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					 The first secretary of the Khabarovsk Territorial Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said that Kim Jong Il's reelection as general secretary of the WPK represented the absolute support and trust of the Korean people in him.
					
					 The chairperson of the Communist Party of Norway expressed belief that the Korean people would surely emerge victors in accomplishing their socialist cause under the distinguished Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, reiterating the will to extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just cause in the future, too.
					
					 The chairperson of the Consultative Committee of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK noted that the society would make positive efforts to develop the relations between the two countries.
					
					 A meeting was held in Cuba on Oct. 7 on the occasion of the 65th birthday of the WPK.
					
					 The head of the International Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba said in a speech at the meeting that the party supports the steadfast stand of the WPK to defend the idea and system chosen by it, declaring that the CPC would support and encourage the Korean people in their just cause of protecting the nation's sovereignty and achieving the country's reunification in the future, too.
					
					 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meetings held in Norway and Austria.

articles.title: Kimilsungia Show Held in Guinea
articles.content:
Kimilsungia Show Held in Guinea
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- A Kimilsungia show was held in Guinea between Oct. 4 and 12 to mark the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present at an opening ceremony for the show were members of the Organizing Committee of the Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia Association in Guinea and the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association and masses.
					
					 The DPRK ambassador to Guinea and staff members of his embassy were present there on invitation.
					
					 Speeches were made there. 
					
					 Abdoulaye Diallo, chairman of the above-said committee, said:
					
					 It is great pride and honor for the Guinean people to see the opening of the Kimilsungia show at a time when the Korean people are significantly celebrating the 65th birthday of the glorious WPK after reelecting General Secretary Kim Jong Il as its general secretary. 
					
					 The immortal flower Kimilsungia that struck its roots in Guinea of Africa several years ago is now widely bred not only in Guinea but in its neighboring countries, arousing people's admiration. 
					
					 This flower is now decorating our planet, enchanting people so greatly not simply because of its unusual beauty. 
					
					 This should be interpreted as humankind's manifestation of its sincere reverence for Kim Il Sung lauded by the international community for ushering in the era of independence.
					
					 We will more successfully cultivate and propagate Kimilsungia so as to glorify the greatness of Kim Il Sung as the founder of socialist Korea and the sun of humankind and the immortal exploits he performed in the human cause of independence.

articles.title: Statements Issued to Congratulate Kim Jong Il's Reelection
articles.content:
Statements Issued to Congratulate Kim Jong Il's Reelection
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru released a statement on Oct. 4 congratulating General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 65th birthday.
					 The statement wished Kim Jong Il great successes in his work for further strengthening the WPK and accomplishing the cause of building a thriving nation as early as possible.
					
					 It noted that the strengthening of the WPK and accomplishment of the cause of building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation would powerfully encourage progressive humankind in its struggle for defending global peace from the threats of the U.S. imperialists and its followers.
					
					  The Stoke-on-Trent Branch of the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Peruvian People's Women Union separately issued statements on Oct. 3 and 4 on the occasion of Kim Jong Il's reelection as general secretary of the WPK.

articles.title: Centenary of Birth of  Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Hungary
articles.content:
Centenary of Birth of  Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Hungary
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- A Hungarian preparatory committee was inaugurated on October 6 to commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Gyula Thurmer, chairman of the Hungarian Communist Workers' Party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Finland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Finland 
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Songun Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was brought out in booklet by the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on Oct. 7.
					 The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is a powerful political mode in the present era which carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of attaching importance to the army and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode which most correctly meets the requirements of the times and the revolution. Also clarified in it are the validity and advantages of the Songun politics and its great vitality.

articles.title: Bulletin Issued to Observe Important Days of WPK
articles.content:
Bulletin Issued to Observe Important Days of WPK
Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union issued its bulletin on Oct. 5 to congratulate General Secretary Kim Jong Il on his reelection as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, commemorate the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 84th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					 The bulletin carried portraits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and edited with several articles, the WPK's flag and logo and photos showing the achievements gained by the Korean people in economic construction.
					
					 The bulletin in an article titled "The Conference of the WPK" carried news that Kim Jong Il was reelected general secretary of the WPK.
					
					 In an article titled "The WPK's History" the bulletin noted that Kim Il Sung formed the DIU, making it possible for the Korean revolution to advance under the banner of independence. It introduced the DIU's programme and feats performed by the peerlessly great persons in liberating Korea and building the country.
					
					 The bulletin in an article titled "The Workers' Party of Korea" stressed that the WPK has exercised great influence on the world and wisely led the Korean people in their socialist construction as a party faithfully serving the people and a political staff regarding the Juche idea as its guidelines, something different from other political parties.

articles.title: Inaugurada la reconstruida Universidad de Baile de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Inaugurada la reconstruida Universidad de Baile de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 16 de octubre (ATCC) -- Quedo reconstruida la Universidad de Baile de Pyongyang satisfaciendo los requerimientos formativos y artisticos de la arquitectura.
					En ella estan dadas magnificas condiciones pedagogicas como los edificios principales, el teatro de baile, la sala de deporte, el albergue, etc.
					
					La ceremonia de inauguracion tuvo lugar el dia 15.
					
					En la ocasion participaron los secretarios del CC del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Ki Nam y Choe Thae Bok, el presidente del Comite de Educacion, Kim Yong Jin, el ministro de Cultura An Tong Chun, y otros funcionarios, los constructores, profesores, empleados y estudiantes del plantel docente.
					
					Kim Yong Jin pronuncio el discurso inaugural.
					
					Terminada la ceremonia, los participantes recorrieron la universidad.

articles.title: Denominada escuela secundaria con el nombre del heroe Kim Ju Hyok
articles.content:
Denominada escuela secundaria con el nombre del heroe Kim Ju Hyok
Pyongyang, 16 de octubre (ATCC) -- La Escuela Secundaria de Chukjon de Pyongyang fue denominada como la Escuela Secundaria Kim Ju Hyok en una ceremonia que tuvo lugar el dia 15. 
					En esta escuela fue edificado tambien el busto de ese heroe de la republica que se alisto al Ejercito Popular de Corea al graduarse de la secundaria.
					
					El ha sido siempre el modelo en los ejercicios politicos y militares y en noviembre del ano pasado, combatio valientemente dando su vida en la batalla contra los barcos enemigos que se infiltraron en las aguas jurisdiccionales de la RPDC. 
					
					En la ceremonia de denominacion participaron los funcionarios interesados, los familiares de Kim, militares del EPC, maestros, empleados, alumnos y sus padres. 
					
					Terminado el acto, los participantes vieron el busto del heroe.

articles.title: Publicado en Corea libro sobre Kimilsungia
articles.content:
Publicado en Corea libro sobre Kimilsungia
Pyongyang, 16 de octubre (ATCC) -- Recientemente, ha sido publicado en Corea el libro de historias reales "Kimilsungia y el mundo".
					   El libro narra el curso de nacimiento de la flor con el nombre del Presidente Kim Il Sung, gran hombre sin par, por primera vez en la historia de la humanidad y el hecho de que bajo la minuciosa direccion y la atencion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y gracias a los esfuerzos del pueblo coreano y la humanidad progresista del mundo, esa flor florece plenamente en todo el mundo.
					
					   El libro esta compuesto de los subtitulos tales como "Apego a la flor", "Nacimiento de Kimilsungia", "Admiracion infinita", "Con motivo del Dia del Sol" y "Flor del Sol que florece plenamente en el mundo".
					
					   Resalta que Kimilsungia nacio en el mundo como simbolo de la infinita admiracion de la humanidad progresista hacia el Presidente.
					
					  En abril del 54 (1965) de la Era Juche cuando el Presidente realizaba una visita a Indonesia, el entonces presidente de este pais Sukarno le obsequio una hermosa y rara flor nuevamente cultivada nombrandola como Kimilsungia.
					
					   A traves de esta historia, el libro comprueba el infinito respeto al Presidente de las personalidades celebres y habitantes del mundo.
					
					Cuenta tambien que esa flor desaparecida temporalmente por la fluctuacion de la situacion de Indonesia fue rescatada y trasladada a Corea bajo la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Recoge los hechos demostrando que junto con esa flor del Sol, crecen continuamente las alabanzas al Presidente.

articles.title: Inaugurado festival deportivo nacional por 10 de octubre
articles.content:
Inaugurado festival deportivo nacional por 10 de octubre
Pyongyang, 16 de octubre (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurado el dia 15 en el Centro de Baloncesto del reparto Chongchun el Festival Deportivo Nacional en homenaje al 65o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					  En el certamen se realizaran en Pyongyang, Hamhung, Phyongsong, Wonsan, etc. los partidos de 21 disciplinas, entre ellas, futbol, baloncesto, ping-pong, Taekwondo, tiro y gimnasia artistica.
					
					En el acto estuvieron presentes el jefe de departamento del Comite Central del PTC, Ri Yong Su, y otros funcionarios junto con los deportistas.
					
					  Hizo uso de la palabra inaugural el ministro de Deportes, Pak Myong Chol.
